Uses of Package
elki.evaluation.scores

  • Packages that use elki.evaluation.scores 
    Package Description
    elki.evaluation.clustering
    Evaluation of clustering results.
    elki.evaluation.outlier
    Evaluate an outlier score using a misclassification based cost model.
    elki.evaluation.scores
    Evaluation of rankings and scorings.
    elki.evaluation.scores.adapter
    Adapter classes for ranking and scoring measures.
    elki.result.outlier
    Outlier result classes.
  • Classes in elki.evaluation.scores used by elki.evaluation.clustering 
    Class Description
    ScoreEvaluation
    Compute ranking/scoring based evaluation measures.
  • Classes in elki.evaluation.scores used by elki.evaluation.outlier 
    Class Description
    ScoreEvaluation.Adapter
    Predicate to test whether an object is a true positive or false positive.
  • Classes in elki.evaluation.scores used by elki.evaluation.scores 
    Class Description
    AUPRCEvaluation
    Compute the area under the precision-recall curve (AUPRC).
    AUPRCEvaluation.PRCurve
    ROC Curve
    AveragePrecisionEvaluation
    Evaluate using average precision.
    DCGEvaluation
    Discounted Cumulative Gain.
    MaximumF1Evaluation
    Evaluate using the maximum F1 score.
    NDCGEvaluation
    Normalized Discounted Cumulative Gain.
    PrecisionAtKEvaluation
    Evaluate using Precision@k, or R-precision (when k=0).
    PRGCEvaluation
    Compute the area under the precision-recall-gain curve
    PRGCEvaluation.PRGCurve
    Precision-Recall-Gain curve.
    ROCEvaluation
    Compute ROC (Receiver Operating Characteristics) curves.
    ROCEvaluation.ROCurve
    ROC Curve
    ScoreEvaluation
    Compute ranking/scoring based evaluation measures.
    ScoreEvaluation.Adapter
    Predicate to test whether an object is a true positive or false positive.
  • Classes in elki.evaluation.scores used by elki.evaluation.scores.adapter 
    Class Description
    ScoreEvaluation.Adapter
    Predicate to test whether an object is a true positive or false positive.
  • Classes in elki.evaluation.scores used by elki.result.outlier 
    Class Description
    ScoreEvaluation
    Compute ranking/scoring based evaluation measures.
